docs.title: Invariant Hub
docs.text:
Invariant Hub — a stability router for quantum. This portal provides:

  • Core Spec: the minimal, JSON-first protocol used by the Hub
  • Registry: example certificates produced by the pipeline (readable view + raw JSON)

Tip: open “Core Spec” to review the schema, and “Registry” to browse sample certificates.

docs.title: Core v1 (Schema)
docs.text:
Below is the canonical JSON Schema for the minimal protocol bundle used by the Hub.

{
  "$id": "https://spec.invarianthub.dev/invariant_hub.core.v1.schema.json",
  "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
  "title": "Invariant Hub Core v1",
  "description": "Canonical schema bundle: hit events, dataset (header + pairing policy + events), rounds@1 view, guard manifest/decision, and certificate.",
  "$defs": {
    "event": {
      "title": "Hit Event",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "event_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "minLength": 1
        },
        "run_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "minLength": 1
        },
        "side": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "A",
            "B"
          ]
        },
        "setting": {
          "type": "string",
          "minLength": 1,
          "description": "Label of the local measurement setting (e.g., A, A', B, B')."
        },
        "out": {
          "type": "integer",
          "enum": [
            -1,
            1
          ]
        },
        "ts": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "Timestamp in units defined by dataset.policy.pairing.time_unit (required for time mode)."
        },
        "trial": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 0,
          "description": "Trial/group identifier (required for trial mode)."
        },
        "aux": {
          "type": "object",
          "maxProperties": 16,
          "additionalProperties": true
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "event_id",
        "run_id",
        "side",
        "setting",
        "out"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "events_array": {
      "title": "Events",
      "type": "array",
      "minItems": 1,
      "items": {
        "$ref": "#/$defs/event"
      }
    },
    "dataset_policy": {
      "title": "Pairing Policy",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "pairing": {
          "type": "object",
          "description": "In trial mode, events MUST include 'trial'. In time mode, events MUST include 'ts'. Pairing is deterministic.",
          "properties": {
            "mode": {
              "type": "string",
              "enum": [
                "trial",
                "time"
              ]
            },
            "window": {
              "type": "string",
              "pattern": "^(?:[1-9][0-9]*)(?:s|ms|us|ns)$",
              "description": "If mode=time: pairing window width (e.g., '5ns'); pairing is centered ±window/2."
            },
            "time_unit": {
              "type": "string",
              "enum": [
                "s",
                "ms",
                "us",
                "ns"
              ],
              "default": "ns"
            },
            "rule": {
              "type": "string",
              "enum": [
                "1to1_nn_centered"
              ],
              "default": "1to1_nn_centered",
              "description": "Deterministic pairing rule for time mode."
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "mode"
          ],
          "additionalProperties": false
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "pairing"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "dataset_header": {
      "title": "Dataset Header",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "string",
          "minLength": 1
        },
        "events": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 0
        },
        "policy": {
          "$ref": "#/$defs/dataset_policy"
        },
        "trials_total": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 0,
          "description": "Optional (trial mode): scheduled total trials including empty groups."
        },
        "dataset_hash": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Optional hash of canonicalized events file (e.g., sha256)."
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "id",
        "events",
        "policy"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": true
    },
    "dataset_v1": {
      "title": "Dataset",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "header": {
          "$ref": "#/$defs/dataset_header"
        },
        "events": {
          "$ref": "#/$defs/events_array"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "header",
        "events"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "allOf": [
        {
          "if": {
            "properties": {
              "header": {
                "properties": {
                  "policy": {
                    "properties": {
                      "pairing": {
                        "properties": {
                          "mode": {
                            "const": "time"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "then": {
            "properties": {
              "events": {
                "items": {
                  "required": [
                    "ts"
                  ]
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "if": {
            "properties": {
              "header": {
                "properties": {
                  "policy": {
                    "properties": {
                      "pairing": {
                        "properties": {
                          "mode": {
                            "const": "trial"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "then": {
            "properties": {
              "events": {
                "items": {
                  "required": [
                    "trial"
                  ]
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    "rounds_item_v1": {
      "title": "Round (rounds@1)",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "round_id": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "a_setting": {
          "type": "string",
          "default": ""
        },
        "b_setting": {
          "type": "string",
          "default": ""
        },
        "A": {
          "type": "integer",
          "enum": [
            -1,
            0,
            1
          ],
          "description": "-1/0/+1 (0 = no-click)"
        },
        "B": {
          "type": "integer",
          "enum": [
            -1,
            0,
            1
          ]
        },
        "pair_type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [
            "C",
            "S_A",
            "S_B"
          ],
          "description": "C = coincidence, S_A = single on A, S_B = single on B."
        },
        "delta_t": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "B.ts − A.ts (time mode only; units = dataset.policy.pairing.time_unit)."
        },
        "source": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "A_event_id": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "B_event_id": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "A_ts": {
              "type": "number"
            },
            "B_ts": {
              "type": "number"
            }
          },
          "additionalProperties": false
        },
        "policy_ref": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "mode": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "window": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "time_unit": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          "additionalProperties": true
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "round_id",
        "a_setting",
        "b_setting",
        "A",
        "B",
        "pair_type"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "rounds_view_v1": {
      "title": "rounds@1",
      "type": "array",
      "minItems": 1,
      "items": {
        "$ref": "#/$defs/rounds_item_v1"
      }
    },
    "meter_manifest": {
      "title": "Meter Manifest",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "meter_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name@version, e.g. bell.chsh.meter@1"
        },
        "version": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "requires": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "views": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "minItems": 1
            },
            "min_events": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 0
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "views"
          ],
          "additionalProperties": false
        },
        "outputs": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "license": {
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "meter_id",
        "requires",
        "outputs"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "meter_result": {
      "title": "Meter Result",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "meter_id": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "metrics": {
          "type": "object",
          "additionalProperties": {
            "type": [
              "number",
              "string",
              "boolean",
              "array",
              "object",
              "null"
            ]
          }
        },
        "view_used": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "View used for computation (e.g., 'rounds@1')."
        },
        "inputs_hash": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Hash of inputs (materialized view payload)."
        },
        "evidence_hash": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Hash chaining recipe (dataset/view+manifest+prev_hash)."
        },
        "computed_at": {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "meter_id",
        "metrics",
        "inputs_hash"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "guard_manifest": {
      "title": "Guard Manifest",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "guard_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "name@version, e.g. bell.chsh@1"
        },
        "version": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "requires": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "views": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "minItems": 1,
              "description": "Required views (e.g., 'rounds@1')."
            },
            "min_events": {
              "type": "integer",
              "minimum": 0
            }
          },
          "required": [
            "views"
          ],
          "additionalProperties": false
        },
        "thresholds": {
          "type": "object",
          "additionalProperties": true,
          "description": "Inline policy (classic v1 behaviour)."
        },
        "policy_ref": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "policy_id": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "policy_hash": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          "additionalProperties": false,
          "description": "External policy-pack reference (meter-first mode)."
        },
        "outputs": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "license": {
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "guard_id",
        "requires"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "required": [
            "thresholds"
          ]
        },
        {
          "required": [
            "policy_ref"
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    "guard_status": {
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "GREEN",
        "YELLOW",
        "RED",
        "SKIPPED"
      ]
    },
    "guard_decision": {
      "title": "Guard Result",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "guard_id": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "status": {
          "$ref": "#/$defs/guard_status"
        },
        "metrics": {
          "type": "object",
          "additionalProperties": {
            "type": [
              "number",
              "string",
              "boolean",
              "array",
              "object",
              "null"
            ]
          }
        },
        "view_used": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "View used for computation (e.g., 'rounds@1')."
        },
        "meter_id": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "If decision is based on a meter."
        },
        "meter_result_hash": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Hash of the meter_result used."
        },
        "advice": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "reason": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "evidence_hash": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "inputs_hash": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Hash of inputs used by the guard (e.g., materialized view)."
        }
      },
      "required": [
        "guard_id",
        "status",
        "metrics"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false
    },
    "views_digest_item": {
      "title": "View Digest",
      "type": "object",

          "type": "string"
